ThingDef.label: diamond
ThingDef.description: A hard, white stone. Because of its beauty and rarity, diamond is often used for ornaments and decorations. While its hardness and density also makes it a good material for blunt weapons, its true value lies in its ability to hold a tremendous amount of magical energy and is a popular material in arcane recipes. This cut variant is generally used in trades and fabrication of ceremonial objects.
